


# First we are gonna load the packages

```{r}
# Load necessary packages
library(rstan)
library(coda)
library(cmdstanr)

setwd("/home/rstudio/notas2Ejemplos")

# Data
n <- 10
credito <- c(rep(1, n/2), rep(0, n/2))

# Compile the model which is in Ej1.stan

model_stan <- stan_model("Ej1.stan")



# Fit the model
fit <- sampling(model_stan, data = list(n = n, x = credito), 
                iter = 10000, chains = 2, warmup = 500, thin = 1)

# Extract the posterior predictive samples for x1
samples <- as.matrix(fit)
post_pred_samples <- samples[, grep("x1", colnames(samples))]

# Summary of posterior predictive results
summary(as.mcmc(post_pred_samples))

#traceplot 

library(bayesplot)

# Create traceplot
stan_trace(fit, pars = c("theta"))

#DIC

library(loo)

# Calculate DIC using loo package
dic <- loo(fit)
print(dic)

```
